club.name: WSS Info Tech Club
club.description: Inspiring and equipping students with skills for the modern digital world
club.mission: Our mission as a club is to inspire and equip students with the skills and knowledge needed to succeed in a new age modern digital world. To help the children reach this goal, our hot topics include: ethical hacking, decompiling applications to find viruses, testing, gaming, webpage development, coding, photography, drones, social media management, creating apps, editing, careers in IT, etc. The IT club was founded by our IT Head Of Department, Mr. Danual Bridgemohan.

president.name: Cristian Mohammed
president.bio: Leading the club with vision and passion for technology. Cristian specializes in full-stack development and team leadership, guiding members through complex projects and fostering an innovative learning environment. Under his leadership, the club has grown to 70+ members and launched multiple successful initiatives.

vicePresident.name: Eli Mohammed
vicePresident.bio: Supporting club operations and mentoring members. Eli is an expert in cybersecurity and ethical hacking, regularly leading workshops on network security and penetration testing. He's passionate about teaching others how to stay safe in the digital world.
vicePresident.funFact: Once found a bug in a major app

secretary.name: Solara Gonsalves
secretary.bio: Managing club documentation and communications. Solara ensures everything runs smoothly behind the scenes, from meeting minutes to member communications. She's also our social media strategist, creating engaging content that showcases club achievements.

asstSecretary.name: Aniyah Payne
asstSecretary.bio: Helping coordinate club activities and events. Aniyah brings creativity to the team with her web design skills and photography expertise. She's responsible for capturing our best moments and creating visual content for the club.

pro.name: Divonte Lloyd
pro.bio: Building relationships and promoting club activities. Divonte is our public face, connecting with other clubs, sponsors, and the community. His networking skills have brought numerous guest speakers and workshop opportunities to the club.

asstPRO.name: Leah Morales
asstPRO.bio: Supporting outreach initiatives and social media presence. Leah's graphic design and video editing skills help create stunning promotional materials. She manages our Instagram and TikTok, growing our online community.

cto.name: Keyshuan Sookdar
cto.bio: Leading technical projects and mentoring developers. Keyshuan is our tech genius, specializing in software architecture and game development. He's led the development of 5 major club projects and teaches advanced coding workshops.

treasurer.name: Triston Samuel
treasurer.bio: Managing club finances and resources. Triston ensures we have the equipment and resources needed for all our projects. His data analysis skills help the club make informed decisions about investments and fundraising.

asstTreasurer.name: Hassan Mohammed
asstTreasurer.bio: Assisting with budget management and fundraising. Hassan combines his passion for app development with financial responsibilities, creating tools to track club expenses. He's also our UI/UX design expert.

founder.name: Mr. Danual Bridgemohan
founder.bio: Founded the IT Club in 2024 with a vision to create a space where students could explore technology beyond the classroom. Mr. Bridgemohan has been teaching IT for over 15 years and believes in hands-on, project-based learning. His guidance has helped countless students pursue careers in technology.

achievements.title: National Tech Competition Finalists
achievements.description: 3 teams reached finals in web dev category

achievements.title: Best School Club Award
achievements.description: Recognized for innovation and community impact

achievements.title: 5 Student Apps Published
achievements.description: Learning tools and games created by members
